title: Episode 284: Phasing Out Social Security
itunes:title: Episode 284: Phasing Out Social Security
description:
Social Security has become a trillion dollar weight dragging down our economics and politics. On the one hand, according to the Social Security administration itself, the program will be insolvent within a decade. On the other, we can’t shut it down without condemning many elderly to destitution. This week, we talk about a plan that would phase out Social Security, do it without cutting benefits to current retirees, leave future retirees better off, and save the government money. The catch is that the phase-out requires many decades.

 

Get Your Copy of Cooperation and Coercion Now!
